name: Moral Compass: GPS Edition
description:
Billy is a simple man, and he just wants to know what path to take through life in order to make it to Heaven. As with any navigational problem, he asks his trusty GPS for help.

Made for the 6th Game Factory Jam.

Credits:

  • Code: Ben Whittaker
  • Modelling & Level Design: Jeff Lyons
  • 2D Art: Valerie Vaz
  • Writing: Tejas Gandhi
  • General Meddling: Jonathan Umar-Khitab
